summary: WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED  TRAILERS BRAKES TENDED TO OVERHEAT.   TRAILER WAS DESIGNED TO BE USED WITH DISC BRAKES, BUT,  CONSUMER FOUND THAT THE MANUFACTURER INSTALLED DRUM BRAKES.   *AK  IT WAS LATER DETERMINED THAT THE INCORRECT MASTER CYLINDER WAS INSTALLED ON THE TRAILER AT THE FACTORY.  THE INCORRECT MASTER CYLINDER CAUSED THE BRAKES TO REMAIN ON ONCE APPLIED AND NOT RELEASE.  *NM
